Name: HsCRPRiskCS
Title: hs-CRP Cardiovascular Risk CodeSystem
Description: Cardiovascular risk classification based on high-sensitivity C-Reactive Protein levels.  Based on AHA/CDC Scientific Statement on Markers of Inflammation and Cardiovascular Disease: - Pearson TA, et al. Circulation. 2003;107(3):499-511. doi:10.1161/01.CIR.0000052939.59093.45 - Ridker PM, et al. Circulation. 2003;107(3):363-369. doi:10.1161/01.CIR.0000053730.47739.3C  Risk stratification thresholds: - Low risk: hs-CRP < 1.0 mg/L - Average risk: hs-CRP 1.0-3.0 mg/L - High risk: hs-CRP > 3.0 mg/L  Note: No SNOMED-CT codes exist for this specific clinical classification as of 2025. This CodeSystem follows thesis semantic hierarchy Level 3: local codes with documented source and migration pathway when standard terminology becomes available.  Future migration: Monitor SNOMED-CT International Edition for cardiovascular risk finding codes.

Name: IOSPhysicalActivityCS
Title: iOS Physical Activity CodeSystem
Description: CodeSystem for physical activity types from Apple HealthKit HKWorkoutActivityType. Enables interoperability between iOS Health App data and standard terminologies (SNOMED CT, LOINC).

Name: LifestyleObservationCS
Title: Lifestyle Medicine Observation Codes
